name: The Circular Rocks
description:
Welcome to the ball breaker hero game where you have to crush the Rock balls with your cannon.
Indulge yourself in the epic game full of excitement "The Circular Rocks". It’s a casual arcade game and get ready for the unlimited cannon shooting fun.

Ball blaster is simple and easy to play. Use your cannon and get in action. Start swiping the screen left and right to move the cannon to fire. You will see giant Rock balls coming from the top. Aim them in the line of fire and blast the balls until they explode. Bigger balls split to smaller ones when hit with the cannon bullets. Make sure you will crush and smash all the number rock balls. Ball Blaster game offers a lot of challenges to keep you engaged. Complexity increase as you progress through the levels.
Train your brain with extreme hitting tricks and fire the bullets from canon. It’s time to hit the Rock balls, blast the balls and enjoy the infinity cannons ball shooting fun. Shoot the balls and upgrade your cannon, how long can you survive? If you are a fan of ball shooting game, then this Cannon game is one of the best choices to experience! Earn free coins when you hit the balls! This is very easy as you can sitting shooting, standing shooting, lying down shooting, class shooting, sleeping shooting, subway shooting, park shooting anytime and anywhere.

Features
-High quality visuals of ball breaker
-Attractive Theme
-Amazing sounds and music
-Addictive gameplay with its unique ball blaster features
-Multilevel ball shoot blast challenge
-Smooth and easy game control
-Beat your own best
-Play free!
How to play
1. Use your cannon and upgrade it.
2. Swipe your finger to move cannon.
3. Collect gold by destroying balls and upgrade your cannon.
4. Easy to learn, but hard to master.
5. Challenge with your friends and show them your highest score.
You become a rock ball shooter, balls will fly and jump, you must avoid it by moving around and use cannon shot to destroy all big rock balls, if you are a fan of balls game, Ball Blaster is one of the best choices to experience balls shoot, Smash all the rock balls, blast and win!
Enjoy this super interesting Ball Blaster game, be a great ball shooter master and blast the monster to save the world now!
